snippet: The vice-presidential candidates engaged on the issues that matter most, a change for voters starved for substance.
abstract: Editorial extols substantive nature of vice-presidential debate, which gave voters chance to evaluate positions of both tickets; applauds Vice Pres Joseph R Biden Jr for disputing Rep Paul Ryan's misleading claims.
lead_paragraph: The vice-presidential candidates engaged on the issues that matter most, a change for voters starved for substance.

headline.seo: A Debate With Clarity and Fervor
headline.main: A Debate With Clarity and Fervor
headline.print_headline: A Debate With Clarity and Fervor
